pages.text: $(li)The Snowballs can be thrown to other creatures right clicking while you are holding them in your hand.$(br)$(li)The most creatures will not receive any damage, except fire creatures like $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/blaze)Blazes$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be used to craft $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/snow)Snow Blocks$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/charm/glowballs)Glowballs$(/l) too.

$(li)You can obtain Snowballs mining the $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/snow)Snow Blocks$(/l) that are located in snow biomes, like $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_taiga)Snowy Taiga$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_tundra)Snowy Tundra$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/snowy_mountains)Snowy Mountains$(/l).
